mapper.sql: id, phone_no, old_offer_id, new_offer_id, change_time, type, is_handle
mapper.select: select b.id, b.phone_no,a.product_offer_id as old_offer_id,a.product_offer_id as new_offer_id, b.change_time, b.type, b.is_handle FROM (SELECT product_offer_id,phone_no FROM asd_self_handle) a inner JOIN (SELECT id, phone_no, change_time, type, is_handle FROM asd_change_history) b ON a.phone_no=b.phone_no
mapper.insert: insert into asd_change_history (id, phone_no, old_offer_id, new_offer_id, change_time, type, is_handle) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oldOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into asd_change_history
id,
phone_no,
old_offer_id,
new_offer_id,
change_time,
type,
is_handle,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update asd_change_history
phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
old_offer_id = #{oldOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
new_offer_id = #{newOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_handle = #{isHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update asd_change_history set phone_no = #{phoneNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, old_offer_id = #{oldOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_offer_id = #{newOfferId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, change_time = #{changeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_handle = #{isHandle,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
